derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: French, literally taken up again', feminine past participle of reprendre (see reprieve)

entry.def: In music, if there is a reprise, an earlier section of music is repeated.
If someone reprises a role or a song, they play or sing it again.

example.ex: He then proceeded to play for more than two hours, reprising every one of his hits.
example.tran: 他又接着演奏了两个多小时，将他的每一首知名作品都演奏了一遍。

means.word_mean: 1. repeat an earlier theme of a composition
